show.title: Investing in Regenerative Agriculture and Food

title: 104 Judith D Schwartz on why our current economic framework is completely inadequate for regeneration at scale
subtitle: 104 Judith D Schwartz on why our current economic framework is completely inadequate for regeneration at scale
summary:
The author Judith D. Schwartz joins us once again to discuss her new book, The Reindeer Chronicles, wherein she dives deep into regeneration at a large scale.

-----------------------------------------------------

Join our Gumroad community, discover the tiers and benefits on www.gumroad.com/investinginregenag.
Other ways to support our work:

- Or buy us a coffee… or a meal!
www.Ko-fi.com/regenerativeagriculture.

------------------------------------------------------
The landscapes around us are a reflection of our consciousness and wealth is found in our functional ecosystems. Is it true that many of us secretly don’t believe or can’t imagine that abundance is actually possible? We dive into all that in this exciting episode with Judith D Schwartz.

More about this episode on https://investinginregenerativeagriculture.com/judith-d-schwartz-2/.

Find our video course here:
https://investinginregenerativeagriculture.com/course/
